channel.title: Game speed on C&C
channel.description: Okay so I'm playing Command and conquer generals:zero hour and in the skirmish menu bit it says game speed.... now.. when its at its lowest (15) it goes really slow and when its at its highest (59/--) it goes the same slow speed.. now i know for a fact that it can go faster than its snail pace because i was at this guys house and it was going like really fast. It's not my computer because ive tried it on other ones and it goes slow.. how do i get it to go faster?

item.title: Game speed on C&C
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Ummmm then how do i get the vehicles to go faster? Because i know that they go faster than what they do now… Also with time bombs 1 second takes about 2.5 seconds.

Read full topic

item.title: Game speed on C&C
item.dc:creator: @mindtempest mindtempest
item.description:
@mindtempest wrote:

its not that kind of speed. its the speed in which the buildings are built and the speed they generate money, and its the same both ways. it doesnt really make a diff though.

Read full topic

item.title: Game speed on C&C
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

On another topic

I’ve never played generals, but I’ve played my of the C&C games, make sure your not just selected the scroll speed.

Nope i selected game speed… This bit:

Edit: I’ve just tried it on low detail, medium and high and they all go the same speed… so it’s not lag.

Read full topic
